item.title: The TARDIS Website
item.description: The TARDIS website is an official place to display the research, community, documentation rules, and more. The website was made to give TARDIS a proper place to display information that isn’t relevant to the documentation of the TARDIS codebase, as it originally was all in one place on GitHub. I was tasked with creating the website for the most part. The template was picked out by my mentor for the website, Jalahd Singhal, and I created a rodemap for how we should customize it to fit the collaboration’s needs.
